children.text: The slab had not been originally poured as part of the slab as detailed on the engineering design, and has subsequently been poured later.

The engineering drawings I have been provided with do not have a design detail for attaching this new section to the existing slab. The builder should forward the engineering design and building surveyor’s inspection approval notice for this amendment to the slab.

In the absence of this documentation, the builder should demolish this section and reconstruct in accordance with the rectification design provided by the original design engineer. The owner should request a copy of the engineer’s rectification design and ensure that any work is carried out under the supervision and approval of the building surveyor.
